title: Amid military aggression, China ramps up diplomacy with US
description: Despite the provocations, U.S. and Chinese officials met in Beijing Monday.

title: Thousands of women participate in sit-in at Colorado Capitol against gun violence
description: Thousands of women participate in a sit-in at the Colorado state Capitol Monday, calling on Gov. Jared Polis to sign an executive order to ban guns.

title: Oklahoma school board approves what would be the 1st taxpayer-funded religious school in US
description: Oklahoma board voted 3-2 to approve the application by the Catholic Archdiocese.

title: Norfolk Southern is first railroad to give all workers sick time
description: Nearly 60% of rail workers have secured the benefit since the start of the year.

title: Anna Shay, fan favorite on 'Bling Empire,' dead at 62
description: Heiress and philanthropist was a breakout star of the Netflix reality series.

title: Toxic smoke from Canadian wildfires could impact health of millions of Americans
description: Smoke from the Canadian wildfires has created toxic air quality in the U.S. Breathing in that smoke could have dangerous health impacts for millions, experts said.

title: FBI agent turned notorious spy Robert Hanssen dies
description: Hansen, 79, was found unresponsive in his prison cell, officials said.

title: Vermont school district settles lawsuit over coach's suspension related to trans athlete
description: A coach was suspended after he misgendered a female transgender athlete.

title: Sheriff: Neighbor feud over playing children ends with Florida mother dead
description: Officials say a neighborhood feud ended in a Florida mother’s fatal shooting.

title: Judge who once did legal work for Trump can continue in criminal case
description: Hellerstein revealed last week that he had once performed legal work for a Trump entity in the 1990s.

title: Apple announces mixed reality headset Vision Pro
description: Apple made the announcement on Monday at its annual developers conference.

title: Missouri man set for execution on 'emotional roller coaster,' attorney says
description: There are efforts to spare his life just a day before his scheduled execution.

title: Is Outlook down? Thousands of users report problems with Microsoft's email platform
description: Thousands of Microsoft Outlook users reported issues with accessing and using the email platform Monday morning

title: Wild blueberry production takes a dip in the face of drought
description: The nation’s production of wild blueberries slipped a bit last year as some growers contended with drought

title: Pence files paperwork for presidential campaign
description: Former Vice President Mike Pence filed paperwork with the Federal Election Commission Monday to launch his presidential campaign.

title: Trump lawyers meet with Justice Department officials
description: They've claimed an "injustice" perpetrated by special counsel Jack Smith.

title: Noom joins Weight Watchers in offering medications for weight loss
description: Noom's new service is called Noom Med and carries a monthly fee.

title: 'It was tough': WWII veterans return to Utah Beach to commemorate D-Day
description: Dozens of World War II veterans have traveled to Normandy to mark the 79th anniversary of D-Day, the decisive but deadly assault that led to the liberation of France and Western Europe from Nazi control

title: Atlanta City Council to vote on budget for so-called 'Cop City'
description: The Atlanta City Council will vote on a budget for the Atlanta Public Safety Training Center, dubbed "Cop City" by critics.

title: 6 injured in New Haven partial building collapse released from hospital
description: Six construction workers injured in a partial building collapse in New Haven have been released from a hospital, while two others continue to be treated and are in fair condition

title: Senators warn Twitter, Elon Musk over alleged 'disregard' for data privacy
description: The notice came after the reported resignation of two of Twitter's data security executives.

title: GM to invest more than $1 billion in two Flint, Michigan, plants
description: General Motors plans to invest more than $1 billion in two manufacturing plants in Flint, Michigan in order to to prepare them for production of the next-generation internal combustion engine heavy-duty trucks

title: Driver gets fined $129,544 after latest speeding episode in Finland
description: In Finland, penalties are calculated on the basis of an offender’s income.

title: Is it real or made by AI? Europe wants a label for that as it fights disinformation
description: The European Union is pushing online platforms like Google and Meta to step up efforts to fight false information by adding labels to text, photos and other content generated by artificial intelligence

title: WATCH:  Rare white panda captured on video
description: Believed to be the only all-white panda in the world, the animal was reportedly first spotted in southwestern China in 2019.

title: Hong Kong police arrest woman accused of killing 3 young daughters
description: Hong Kong police have arrested a woman accused of killing her three young daughters in a case that has shocked many in the city, where violent crime is rare

title: Palestinian toddler shot by Israeli troops in West Bank dies of wounds
description: A 3-year-old Palestinian boy who was shot by Israeli troops in the occupied West Bank last week has died of his wounds

title: OpenAI boss 'heartened' by talks with world leaders over will to contain AI risks
description: The CEO of OpenAI says he is encouraged by a desire shown by world leaders to contain any risks posed by the artificial intelligence technology his company and others are developing

title: NTSB launches crash investigation after F-16s scrambled near capital
description: Federal officials have launched an investigation into how an unresponsive Cessna aircraft flew on Sunday into restricted airspace in Washington, D.C.

title: France's spectacular abbey Mont-Saint-Michel celebrates 1,000th birthday
description: France’s beloved abbey of Mont-Saint-Michel has reached a ripe old age

title: Ukrainian counteroffensive 'shaping-up'
description: Well-equipped Ukrainian combat forces are now in "assembly areas," close enough to front line areas, meaning they could soon launch a concerted attack on Russian forces.

title: Woman allegedly paid to hire hitman to kill wife of her dating match
description: A Tennessee woman allegedly paid to hire a hitman to kill the wife of a man she met on Match.com, according to a recently unsealed criminal complaint.

title: US defense secretary discusses upgrading ties with India to counter China
description: U.S. Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin has discussed upgrading partnership with India, a major arms buyer, and set a roadmap for cooperation for the next five years as both countries grapple with China’s economic rise and increased belligerence

title: Israel's Netanyahu appoints new media advisor, report says
description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu has appointed a new media advisor who has tweeted critically against President Joe Biden

title: Saudi Arabia welcomes Venezuelan leader Maduro, reaching out to yet another US foe
description: Saudi Arabia has welcomed Venzuelan President Nicolas Maduro on an official visit, reaching out to yet another U.S. foe as the oil-rich kingdom engages in a flurry of diplomacy

title: Russia claims it thwarted Ukrainian attacks in provinces annexed by Moscow
description: Russian officials say their forces thwarted large Ukrainian attacks in two provinces of Ukraine illegally annexed by Moscow

title: Hong Kong journalist wins appeal in rare court ruling upholding media freedom
description: An award-winning Hong Kong journalist has won her appeal in a rare court ruling upholding media freedom in the territory

title: Russia says it thwarted large Ukrainian attack in Donetsk; unclear if this was start of Ukrainian counteroffensive
description: Unclear if the attack in Donetsk was the start of a Ukrainian counteroffensive.

title: US, UK navies say they respond to distress call as Iran's Revolutionary Guard 'harassed' ship
description: US, UK navies say call came from ship 'harassed' by Iran's Revolutionary Guard.
